content: SaaS application needs per-user token budgets and usage tracking across multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google). Database: Supabase. Backend: SvelteKit with Inngest workflows.

Implemented 3 new job sources (RemoteOK, WeWorkRemotely, Jooble) + Redis caching + PostgreSQL FTS/HNSW upgrades. Pattern: parallel agent implementation with 6 specialized agents for different components.
